constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 95 (Friday, June 3, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ESPAILLAT:
H.R. 7935.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Section 5 of Amendment XIV of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H5233]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Opportunities in the Americas Act
